Package de.linguatools.disco

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cluster
    This class provides methods that operate on sets of semantically similar words or collocations.
    Compositionality
    This class contains support for compositional distributional semantics.
    ConfigFile
    This class contains methods for creating, reading and accessing the configuration file "disco.config".
    DISCO
    DISCO (Extracting DIStributionally Similar Words Using CO-occurrences) provides a number of methods for computing the distributional (i.e.
    Main
    This class provides the command line interface for DISCO.
    Rank
    This class contains methods that are based on the rank a word occupies in the similarity list of other words.
    ReturnDataBN
    This class provides a data structure that is used as return value for the method DISCO.similarWords().
    ReturnDataCol
    This class provides a data structure that is used as return value by several methods in the DISCO package.
    ReturnDataCooc Deprecated 
    TextSimilarity
    This class provides methods to compute the semantic similarity between two short pieces of text, i.e.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Compositionality.VectorCompositionMethod
    Implemented methods of vector composition.
    ConfigFile.FileFormat
    Known file formats.
    DISCO.SimilarityMeasure
    Available measures for vector comparison.
    DISCO.WordspaceType
    Available word space types (SIM = word space contains lists of pre-computed similar words for each word, COL = word space contains only word vectors).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CorruptConfigFileException
    Exception that is thrown when some information that should be present in the file disco.config in the word space directory can not be read.
    WrongWordspaceTypeException
    This exception is thrown when a method that only works with word spaces of type WordspaceType.SIM is called with a word space of type WordspaceType.COL.
